title: CNBC's The China Connection newsletter: Three economic flashpoints for 2026
description: China's top leaders are expected to discuss economic plans for the year ahead during an annual meeting next week.
content:
This report is from this week's CNBC's The China Connection newsletter, which brings you insights and analysis on what's driving the world's second-largest economy. You can subscribe here.
